DOC.brief_summary: Body Dysmorphic Disorder ( BDD ) participant demonstrate great attentional bias compare healthy control ( HC ) participant . Greater attention bias associate great distress . Greater attention bias associate great symptom severity .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria BDD healthy control participant : male females 18 year age old sufficient fluency English understand study staff , procedure , questionnaire ability provide inform consent Inclusion BDD participant ; primary diagnosis Diagnostic Statistical Manual 4th Edition ( DSMIVTR ) BDD BDD YaleBrown Obsessive Compulsive Disorder score ( YBOCS ) > 20 primary facial/head concern Major medical neurological condition schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder , current lifetime DSMIV psychotic disorder attributable delusional BDD current suicidality current homicidality Exclusion criterion healthy control : Any current Axis I psychiatric illness history BDD
